Introduction

Lee Eun Sang is a South Korean singer and rapper under Brand New Music. He is a former member of the boy group X1 and current member of the boy group YOUNITE.

In 2019, while he was still a trainee, Eunsang participated in Mnet's boy group survival show Produce X 101, representing Brand New Music. He finished in the X place, thus becoming a member of X1. The group officially debuted on August 27, 2019 with the mini album "Quantum Leap".
